about_seo_title: About Stocknear — The Data Wall Street Doesn't Share
about_seo_description: Options flow. Dark pool data. Congress trades. The same data hedge funds use — built for regular investors by a physicist who got tired of bad tools.
about_hero_title: Wall Street's data advantage ends here
about_hero_description: Options flow. Dark pool activity. Congress trades. Insider transactions. The same data hedge funds use — now accessible at the lowest price in the industry.
about_story_paragraph_1: Stocknear exists because the tools available to regular investors were, frankly, terrible. Overpriced terminals. Ad-infested screeners. "Free" platforms making money by selling your data or pushing sponsored picks.
about_story_paragraph_2: Our founder came from physics — used to working with clean datasets and rigorous analysis. When he started investing and saw what retail investors were stuck with, the gap was hard to ignore. Hedge funds had options flow, dark pool data, insider transactions, and real-time analytics. Everyone else got delayed quotes and banner ads.
about_story_paragraph_3: So we built something better. No venture capital telling us what to prioritize. No advertisers deciding what appears on your screen — ever. Our users decide what gets built next through Discord, not a boardroom. Just the data, at the absolute lowest price point in the entire industry. Because the goal was always to help the little guy, not extract from them.
about_cta_title: Every stock. Every data point. Free to start.
about_cta_description: Sign up in seconds. No credit card. No catch.
